statements: SELECT * FROM ar_content_assets;
SELECT id, asset_name FROM ar_content_assets;
SELECT asset_type, asset_url FROM ar_content_assets;
SELECT * FROM ar_content_assets WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT upload_date, asset_name FROM ar_content_assets ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ar_content_assets WHERE asset_type = 'image' ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT id, asset_name, upload_date FROM ar_content_assets WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY upload_date ASC;
SELECT asset_url FROM ar_content_assets WHERE asset_name LIKE '%logo%' ORDER BY upload_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, upload_date FROM ar_content_assets WHERE asset_name LIKE '%background%' AND asset_type = 'video';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_assets, asset_type FROM ar_content_assets GROUP BY asset_type ORDER BY total_assets DESC;
SELECT * FROM images ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT title, image_url FROM images WHERE id = 3;
SELECT description, title FROM images WHERE title LIKE '%nature%';
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE duration >= 60 ORDER BY duration ASC;
SELECT id, video_url FROM videos WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM images WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, title, image_url FROM images WHERE title LIKE '%nature%';
SELECT id, title, description FROM images WHERE id < 10 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE duration > 60 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT title, video_url FROM videos WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY title ASC;

SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM ar_content_assets;

SELECT video_name, duration FROM videos ORDER BY duration DESC;

SELECT * FROM images WHERE image_size > 1000;
SELECT video_name, duration FROM videos WHERE duration > 60 ORDER BY duration DESC;

SELECT id, name, file_path, size FROM images;
SELECT name, id, size, file_path FROM images;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE size > 100;
SELECT id, name, file_path FROM images WHERE name LIKE 'Nature%';
SELECT name, file_path, size FROM images ORDER BY size DESC;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE size > 100
SELECT name, size FROM images WHERE size <= 200 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT id, name, file_path FROM videos WHERE duration > 60 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM images INNER JOIN image_tags ON images.id = image_tags.image_id WHERE tag_id = '545f6445-93c7-4c27-b7b2-27afdcb9dea7'
SELECT images.id, images.name, tags.name FROM images JOIN image_tags ON images.id = image_tags.image_id JOIN tags ON image_tags.tag_id = tags.id
SELECT * FROM ar_assets;
SELECT asset_name, upload_date FROM ar_assets;
SELECT id, asset_type FROM ar_assets;
SELECT image_url, image_size FROM ar_images;
SELECT video_url, video_duration FROM ar_videos;
SELECT * FROM ar_assets WHERE asset_type = 'Image';
SELECT asset_name, upload_date FROM ar_assets ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT ar_assets.asset_name, ar_images.image_url FROM ar_assets JOIN ar_images ON ar_assets.id = ar_images.asset_id WHERE ar_images.image_size > 100;
SELECT ar_assets.asset_name, ar_tags.tag_name FROM ar_assets JOIN asset_tags ON ar_assets.id = asset_tags.asset_id JOIN ar_tags ON asset_tags.tag_id = ar_tags.tag_id;
SELECT DISTINCT asset_type FROM ar_assets WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01';
